NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA
9
Medicolegal implications for these guidelines 
These guidelines have been designed by the department of health to guide the care that is provided for pregnant women 
and neonates in South Africa. They represent the desired standard of care. Clinicians must be aware of the guideline
